summary: This is an email chain between U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (USAO SDNY) staff discussing the preparation of an update memo on the Jeffrey Epstein case for a meeting. The emails reference the need to include information about Florida victims litigation and coordinate on content.

persons.name: Audrey
persons.context: A memo is being prepared for her; she is noted as needing to get up to speed on Florida victims litigation.

events.title: Scheduled meeting on Epstein case
events.description: A meeting is scheduled for Monday, April 29, 2019, regarding the Epstein case, prompting the request for an update memo.

keyFacts: An update memo on the Jeffrey Epstein investigation was being prepared by the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York in late April 2019.
The memo was intended for internal briefing, specifically for a meeting scheduled for Monday, April 29, 2019, and was not initially for distribution to Washington, D.C.
The preparation required familiarity with the Florida victims litigation related to Epstein.
The email chain shows coordination among several USAO SDNY staff members, though most names are redacted in the provided text.
